thig1.5:1.1: attach yourself to the Dhamma / yoke yourself to Dhamma. /Tissā, diventa tutt'uno con il Dhamma, [yuñjeti is related to yoga. Rather than exertion, I think it's best to highlight how there are wholesome attachments.
thig1.5:1.2: do not let the slightest time be wasted. / do not let even a moment pass you by. / waste no time.
thig1.5:1.3: Quelli che si lasciano sfuggire quest'occasione sono destinati a soffrire, consegnati all'inferno.
